string.name: media_route_menu_title
string.translation_description: A button allowing users to select which media device the video should appear on. eg. Cast on TV | Upstairs Television

string.name: touch_to_cast
string.translation_description: Touch the Cast icon to cast Santa Tracker to your TV

resources.string: Коснитесь этого значка, чтобы передать изображение на телевизор.

string.name: connection_temp_lost
string.translation_description: Connection to the cast device is temporarily lost

string.name: connection_recovered
string.translation_description: Connection to the cast device is recovered

string.name: cast_game_controller
string.translation_description: Cast game controller which allows a user to control games on the TV using directional buttons or gestures. Displayed on a dialog to allow the user to navigate to the Cast game controller screen

string.name: content_desc_mode_switch
string.translation_description: Switch mode from dpad to trackpad. The dpad or directional pad displays buttons for sending up/down/left/right directional commands to the game on the TV.

resources.string: переключиться с кнопок на сенсорную панель

string.name: content_desc_right_button
string.translation_description: Accessibility content description for the directional pad right button

string.name: content_desc_up_button
string.translation_description: Accessibility content description for the directional pad up button

string.name: content_desc_down_button
string.translation_description: Accessibility content description for the directional pad down button

string.name: content_desc_enter_button
string.translation_description: Accessibility content description for the directional pad enter button

string.name: content_desc_left_button
string.translation_description: Accessibility content description for the directional pad left button
